entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sandy Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:18 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 39.
